name: Dream Hills - Captured Magic: A Hidden Object Seek and Find Game for iPad
name_original: Dream Hills - Captured Magic: A Hidden Object Seek and Find Game for iPad
description:
At the Festival of Great Balance an evil spell is cast. Help the Fairy Godmother break the curse in Dream Hills – Captured Magic, an enchanted hidden object game.

The merry, bustling kingdom of Dream Hills is no longer merry nor bustling. The happy-go-lucky residents are unable to live the fairy tale life they had become accustomed to. During the Festival of Great Balance, the evil witch hatched a wicked plan and poisoned the Fairy Godmother. Many years have passed since then and the Fairy Godmother is just waking up. It's time to help her restore the fairy tale kingdom and take on the evil which has come over it.

Will you be able to banish the evil witch and help your favorite fairy tale characters? Install today and play for FREE, then unlock once in app to enjoy the full adventure.

***FREE Version Features***
- 30 minutes of FREE Hidden Object game play.
- Seek and find objects to advance through the magical storyline.
- Beautiful and engaging graphics
- Enjoy the company of beloved fairy tale characters.

***Full Version Features***
- 31 Locations
- 21 Hidden Object Scenes
- 32 exciting puzzles
- Hours of Fun Hidden Object game play

If you encounter issues with the game please email: apple-games@gamehousepartners.zendesk.com
